title: Jin Ramen
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Ramen noodle place with a couple NYC shops. In addition to the traditional Japanese menu (non-veg) there are vegetable and tofu items (tofu salad, kelp, edamame, pickled lotus root and green beans, shishito peppers (omit the "crunch"); a few main dishes are vegan suitable. Offers a mushroom and a shoyu broth ramen (both vegan) with tofu and vegetables. Two donburi rice bowls come with tofu and veggies. Be sure to let your server know if vegan.
